meanings.definition: A punctuation mark (‽) combining the question mark (?) and exclamation point (!), used to express a question in an excited or surprised manner.
meanings.sent1: Have you ever seen an interrobang in a sentence before?
meanings.sent2: I added an interrobang to show my excitement!
meanings.sent3: The interrobang on the page made the sentence look interesting.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened in an interrobang-like expression of surprise.
meanings.sent5: The interrobang stood out among the other punctuation marks.
